FuncDef: This command configures the delay, in seconds, that fault propagation is delayed because of port or MC-LAG state changes. This provides the amount of time for system stabilization during a port state changes that may be protected by MC-LAG. This command requires the standby-mep-shutdown command in order to take effect.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time in seconds. Zero means no delay. Values-0 to 60.
